duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle inbound leads and guide potential customers to work with the company.
Utilize digital marketing expertise to drive sales and customer engagement.
Facilitate customer relationship management and negotiation processes.
Collaborate with the marketing team to align sales strategies with marketing initiatives.
Provide exceptional customer experiences and ensure customer delight at every interaction.
Utilize data-driven insights to continuously improve sales strategies and achieve sales targets.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field
